channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-36198|2024-08-04T00:54:51.398Z -- johnson%20controls -- entrapass
item.description: Successful exploitation of this vulnerability could allow an unauthorized user to access sensitive data.

item.title: CVE-2020-9046|2024-08-04T10:19:19.774Z -- johnson%20controls -- kantech%20entrapass%20security%20management%20software%20special%20edition%20versions%208.22%20and%20prior
item.description: A vulnerability in all versions of Kantech EntraPass Editions could potentially allow an authorized low-privileged user to gain full system-level privileges by replacing critical files with specifically crafted files.

item.title: CVE-2021-36205|2024-08-04T00:54:50.703Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Under certain circumstances the session token is not cleared on logout.

item.title: CVE-2021-36199|2024-08-04T00:54:50.683Z -- johnson%20controls -- videoedge
item.description: Running a vulnerability scanner against VideoEdge NVRs can cause some functionality to stop.

item.title: CVE-2021-36207|2024-08-04T00:54:50.990Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances improper privilege management in Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS servers versions 10 and 11 could allow an authenticated user to elevate their privileges to administrator.

item.title: CVE-2020-9047|2024-08-04T10:19:19.396Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision%20web%20service%20versions%2020.03.2.0%20and%20prior
item.description: A vulnerability exists that could allow the execution of unauthorized code or operating system commands on systems running exacqVision Web Service versions 20.06.3.0 and prior and exacqVision Enterprise Manager versions 20.06.4.0 and prior. An attacker with administrative privileges could potentially download and run a malicious executable that could allow OS command injection on the system.

item.title: CVE-2020-9050|2024-08-04T10:19:20.011Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20reporting%20engine%20%28mre%29%20web%20services%20versions%202.0%20and%202.1
item.description: Path Traversal vulnerability exists in Metasys Reporting Engine (MRE) Web Services which could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to access and download arbitrary files from the system.

item.title: CVE-2021-36204|2024-08-04T00:54:51.234Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas
item.description: Under some circumstances an Insufficiently Protected Credentials vulnerability in Johnson Controls Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 10 versions prior to 10.1.6 and 11 versions prior to 11.0.3 allows API calls to expose credentials in plain text.

item.title: CVE-2021-36206|2024-08-04T00:54:50.795Z -- johnson%20controls -- cevas
item.description: All versions of CEVAS prior to 1.01.46 do not sufficiently validate user-controllable input and could allow a user to bypass authentication and retrieve data with specially crafted SQL queries.

item.title: CVE-2020-9048|2024-08-04T10:19:19.570Z -- johnson%20controls -- victor%20web%20client%20version%205.4.1%20and%20prior
item.description: A vulnerability in specified versions of American Dynamics victor Web Client and Software House CCURE Web Client could allow a remote unauthenticated attacker on the network to delete arbitrary files on the system or render the system unusable by conducting a Denial of Service attack.

item.title: CVE-2021-36202|2024-08-04T00:54:50.839Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Johnson Controls Metasys could allow an authenticated attacker to inject malicious code into the MUI PDF export feature. This issue affects: Johnson Controls Metasys All 10 versions versions prior to 10.1.5; All 11 versions versions prior to 11.0.2.

item.title: CVE-2021-36201|2024-08-04T00:54:51.076Z -- johnson%20controls -- c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances a CCURE Portal user could enumerate user accounts in CCURE 9000 version 2.90 and prior versions.

item.title: CVE-2020-9045|2024-08-04T10:19:19.232Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000%20v2.70
item.description: During installation or upgrade to Software House C•CURE 9000 v2.70 and American Dynamics victor Video Management System v5.2, the credentials of the user used to perform the installation or upgrade are logged in a file. The install log file persists after the installation.

item.title: CVE-2021-36200|2024-08-04T00:54:50.708Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20ads%2Fadx%2Foas%20server
item.description: Under certain circumstances an unauthenticated user could access the the web API for Metasys ADS/ADX/OAS 10 versions prior to 10.1.6 and 11 versions prior to 11.0.2 and enumerate users.

item.title: CVE-2020-9044|2024-08-04T10:19:19.812Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys%20application%20and%20data%20server%20%28ads%2C%20ads-lite%29
item.description: XXE vulnerability exists in the Metasys family of product Web Services which has the potential to facilitate DoS attacks or harvesting of ASCII server files. This affects Johnson Controls' Metasys Application and Data Server (ADS, ADS-Lite) versions 10.1 and prior; Metasys Extended Application and Data Server (ADX) versions 10.1 and prior; Metasys Open Data Server (ODS) versions 10.1 and prior; Metasys Open Application Server (OAS) version 10.1; Metasys Network Automation Engine (NAE55 only) versions 9.0.1, 9.0.2, 9.0.3, 9.0.5, 9.0.6; Metasys Network Integration Engine (NIE55/NIE59) versions 9.0.1, 9.0.2, 9.0.3, 9.0.5, 9.0.6; Metasys NAE85 and NIE85 versions 10.1 and prior; Metasys LonWorks Control Server (LCS) versions 10.1 and prior; Metasys System Configuration Tool (SCT) versions 13.2 and prior; Metasys Smoke Control Network Automation Engine (NAE55, UL 864 UUKL/ORD-C100-13 UUKLC 10th Edition Listed) version 8.1.

item.title: CVE-2020-9049|2024-08-04T10:19:19.448Z -- johnson%20controls -- victor%20web%20client%20version%205.6%20and%20prior
item.description: A vulnerability in specified versions of American Dynamics victor Web Client and Software House C•CURE Web Client could allow an unauthenticated attacker on the network to create and sign their own JSON Web Token and use it to execute an HTTP API Method without the need for valid authentication/authorization. Under certain circumstances, this could be used by an attacker to impact system availability by conducting a Denial of Service attack.

item.title: CVE-2024-32862|2024-08-02T14:58:44.835Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the ExacqVision Web Services does not provide sufficient protection from untrusted domains.

item.title: CVE-2024-32863|2024-08-02T14:59:25.751Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the exacqVision Web Services may be susceptible to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)

item.title: CVE-2024-32865|2024-08-02T14:36:24.920Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the exacqVision Server will not properly validate TLS certificates provided by connected devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-32863|2024-08-01T20:59:34.089Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the exacqVision Web Services may be susceptible to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)

item.title: CVE-2024-32931|2024-08-01T21:18:07.426Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the exacqVision Web Service can expose authentication token details within communications.

item.title: CVE-2024-32865|2024-08-01T21:13:24.868Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the exacqVision Server will not properly validate TLS certificates provided by connected devices.

item.title: CVE-2024-32864|2024-08-01T21:08:02.220Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances exacqVision Web Services will not enforce secure web communications (HTTPS)

item.title: CVE-2024-32862|2024-08-01T21:57:13.093Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the ExacqVision Web Services does not provide sufficient protection from untrusted domains.

item.title: CVE-2024-32758|2024-08-01T21:50:16.134Z -- johnson%20controls -- exacqvision
item.description: Under certain circumstances the communication between exacqVision Client and exacqVision Server will use insufficient key length and exchange

item.title: CVE-2024-32753|2024-07-17T14:23:41.965Z -- johnson%20controls -- tyco%20illustra%20pro%20gen%204%20cameras
item.description: Under certain circumstances the camera may be susceptible to known vulnerabilities associated with the JQuery versions prior to 3.5.0 third-party component

item.title: CVE-2024-32861|2024-07-16T14:38:21.211Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000%20installer
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Software House C●CURE 9000 Site Server provides insufficient protection of directories containing executables.

item.title: CVE-2024-32753|2024-07-11T15:31:06.645Z -- johnson%20controls -- tyco%20illustra%20pro%20gen%204%20cameras
item.description: Under certain circumstances the camera may be susceptible to known vulnerabilities associated with the JQuery versions prior to 3.5.0 third-party component

item.title: CVE-2024-32759|2024-07-10T17:43:01.428Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Software House C●CURE 9000 installer will utilize weak credentials.

item.title: CVE-2024-32754|2024-07-04T10:46:41.686Z -- johnson%20controls -- kantech%20kt1%20door%20controller%2C%20rev01
item.description: Under certain circumstances, when the controller is in factory reset mode waiting for initial setup, it will broadcast its MAC address, serial number, and firmware version. Once configured, the controller will no longer broadcast this information.

item.title: CVE-2024-32757|2024-07-02T14:02:15.247Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances unnecessary user details are provided within system logs

item.title: CVE-2024-32932|2024-07-02T14:08:17.013Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the web interface users credentials may be recovered by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2024-0912|2024-06-06T13:29:07.270Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20c%E2%80%A2cure%209000
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Microsoft® Internet Information Server (IIS) used to host the C•CURE 9000 Web Server will log Microsoft Windows credential details within logs. There is no impact to non-web service interfaces C•CURE 9000 or prior versions

item.title: CVE-2024-32752|2024-06-07T16:15:20.239Z -- johnson%20controls -- software%20house%20istar%20pro%2C%20icu
item.description: Under certain circumstances communications between the ICU tool and an iSTAR Pro door controller is susceptible to Machine-in-the-Middle attacks which could impact door control and configuration.

item.title: CVE-2024-32756|2024-07-02T13:53:18.769Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the Linux users credentials may be recovered by an authenticated user.

item.title: CVE-2024-32755|2024-07-02T13:38:41.336Z -- johnson%20controls -- american%20dynamics%20illustra%20essentials%20gen%204
item.description: Under certain circumstances the web interface will accept characters unrelated to the expected input.
